column5: Our home is located very close to town on Highway 290 west offers a spacious den, 3 sofa beds, 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. We do have private residences on the property unattached to the house. You may see them while staying at our house. Note: Other people live in cabins on the property. They park near or around the house so you may see other cars. The entire house is yours for the duration of your stay.
